description: Create outreach message for fashion influencer

user_message: I need to reach out to @techguru (Tech YouTuber, 1M subscribers) for a product review of our new noise-canceling headphones. Key points: early access, honest review, affiliate link. Tone: Professional and enthusiastic.

user_message: Write an outreach message to @eco_chic (Fashion Instagram influencer, 300K followers) for a sponsored post about our sustainable activewear. Key points: eco-friendly materials, ethical production, brand values. Tone: Casual and friendly, emphasizing shared values.

name: ambiguous_creator_description
description: Tests handling of an ambiguous creator description.
user_message: Reach out to @randomguy who posts 'stuff' on TikTok, 10k followers. It's for a new energy drink. Key points: fun, energetic, try the drink. Tone: Very casual, like you're already friends.

name: missing_tone_information
description: Tests handling of missing tone information.
user_message: Contact @gamergirl (Gaming Twitch streamer, 50K followers) for a sponsored stream of our new indie game. Key points: unique gameplay, engaging story, community interaction.

name: negative_constraints
description: Tests handling of negative constraints (what NOT to do).
user_message: Reach out to @chef_joe (Food Instagrammer, 100K followers) for a recipe collaboration. Key points: use our olive oil, healthy recipe, don't mention competitors. Tone: Professional and respectful.

name: complex_key_points
description: Tests handling of complex and detailed key points.
user_message: Contact @travel_vlogger (Travel YouTuber, 200K subscribers) for a sponsored video of our luxury resort. Key points: highlight the spa, mention the Michelin-star restaurant, show the ocean view, emphasize the exclusivity, use drone footage. Tone: Sophisticated and aspirational.

name: non_standard_platform
description: Tests outreach to a creator on a less common platform.
user_message: Reach out to @musician (SoundCloud artist, 5K followers) for a collaboration on a jingle for our new ad. Key points: catchy tune, positive message, use our brand name. Tone: Energetic and creative.

name: follow_up_message
description: Tests creating a follow-up message to a previous outreach.
user_message: Create a follow up message for @techguru, referencing that we contacted them last week about reviewing our headphones.

session_context.last_agent_message:
Hi @techguru,

I've been following your channel for a while and really appreciate your honest, in-depth tech reviews. Your recent video on smartphone audio was particularly insightful!

We're launching new noise-canceling headphones next month and would love to send you an early unit for review. We're looking for creators who value authenticity and creative freedom - no scripted talking points, just your genuine thoughts and experience.  We can offer an affiliate link for any sales generated.

Would you be interested in checking them out? I'd be happy to share more details about the device and answer any questions you might have.

Looking forward to hearing from you!

Best,
[Your Name]

name: creator_with_multiple_platforms
description: Tests identifying the best platform for outreach when the creator is on multiple platforms.
user_message: Reach out to @artist who is on Instagram (100k followers) and TikTok (50k followers). We want them to promote our new art supplies. Key points: vibrant colors, high quality, inspiring creativity. Tone: Enthusiastic and encouraging.

name: vague_campaign_description
description: Tests how the agent handles a vague campaign description with few details.
user_message: Contact @influencer about a 'thing'. They have 20k followers. Just make it sound good. Tone: positive
